summary: A 1024x1024 texture and normal maps replacement for all God's Shrines in the game.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/6538-1-1329526229.jpg [/img]

[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[b] [color=#4ea2e5] Psychosteve's Golden God's Shrines [/color][/b] [b] | V 1.1 [/b]
[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


This mod is a [color=#ffe292]1024 x 1024[/color] texture and normal maps replacement for all God's Shrines in the

game. I made few options too (see bellow). See the included readme file for more details.

You can go to the [color=#ffe292]Solitude's temple[/color] to see all shrines (the shrine of Talos is in [color=#ffe292]Whiterun[/color]).

Enjoy !!




[b] [color=#fbaf37] What's in the box ?? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] 9 God's Shrines with a brushed Golden texture (with scratches and imperfections)

[*] 1 classic pedestal

[*] 1 golden pedestal

[*] Shine of Kinareth - ruby version (changes the blue stone into a ruby)

[*] Shine of Kinareth - emerald version (changes the blue stone into an emerald)

[*] all normal maps included for all elements (normal / shiny / less shiny normal maps)
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Install [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url] and follow the steps to install the options you want.

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Use the manual install package ([color=#ffe292]instructions inside[/color])
[/list]

For [color=#ffe292] BAIN [/color] users go there : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19602 target="_blank"] Golden Gods Shrines -- BCF and BAIN Wizard [/url]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Uninstall [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Just uninstall the mod with [color=#ffe292] Nexus Mod Manager [/color]

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Manually delete all content in the [color=#ffe292] Data/textures/clutter/shrines [/color] folder
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Want more ? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Don't forget to check out my other mods :

[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4707 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's DragonPriest Masks [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4640 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Stone of Barenziah [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5763 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Bust of the Gray Fox [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11010 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's SkyUI icon Set [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7699 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Horse Whistle sound [/url]
[/list]
author: Psychosteve
